heading: Thursday Night
text: Clear to partly cloudy, except clouds decreasing late in the northeast.

heading: Friday
temperature: Mainly upper 40s to mid 50s; mid to upper 50s in southeastern valleys, and in the broad valleys west.

heading: Sunday
text: Chance of a late-day shower in New York.
temperature: Upper 60s to lower 70s west, mid to upper 60s east
